Name: Lamp Simulator
About the game: LAMP SIMULATOR is a realistic game. In the game, you can create the environment you want by changing the intensity and color of the lamp light in your room. You can use the light coming from the monitor in your steam broadcasts in the light settings you have adjusted. With the light hitting your face from the monitor, you can capture the environment you want and take photos or videos.
